name: Bubble Win
description:
Bubble Win - A top classic bubble shooter game for your iPhone and iPad, with cash prizes(where available)!

Everyone playing sees the same color bubbles and boosts. The higher score you get, the more boosts you have! You need to balance shooting speed and match strategy to become a Bubble Win master.

KEY FEATURES:
• Real prize tournaments powered by Skillz
• 90 Seconds Games, pick up and play whenever you like
• Classic Bubble Shooter game
• Multiple modes with amazing Boosts controlled by you
• Free to practice your skills without Ads
• Easy to play hard to master champions
• Challenge people around the world with Skillz

If you have any questions about the game, please contact :support@kudo.games
If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
